title: How Do You Know If A Guy Is About To Make It Official?
description:
Our intern Meredith's friend really likes the man she's dating and wants to take their relationship to the next level. However, she's not sure if he feels the same way. So what are the signs that a guy is into you?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
